data.name: kokkos-fft
data.description: A shared-memory FFT for the Kokkos ecosystem

evidence: README indicates network usage: "Kokkos-FFT implements local interfaces between [Kokkos](https://github.com/kokkos/kokkos) and de facto standard FFT libraries, including [FFTW](http://www.fftw.org), [cufft](https://developer.nvidia.c"
"Kokkos-FFT implements local interfaces between Kokkos and de facto standard FFT libraries" (describes it as an interface/library rather than a standalone end-user app).

"Since Kokkos-FFT is a header-only library, it is enough to simply add as a subdirectory" and the CMake example shows `target_link_libraries(hello-kokkos-fft PUBLIC Kokkos::kokkos KokkosFFT::fft)` (used as a linked dependency in other projects).
